website_summaries.verdict: Smart and comfortable all-day women's mid-cut boots with synthetic leather-like fabric uppers, interior wedge and flexible sole.
pros: Ideal all-day boots that grow more comfortable with time and use
Inside wedge adds support and height
Use of textile ensures breathable comfort through long periods of wear

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort at an afordable price
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable boots I have ever worn. I have ordered a total of 3 pairs just to have them in the future. The synthetic fabric upper breathes well and my feet never sweat in them. I wear them when I am going to be on my feet all day because I know they will remain comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ellen

customer_reviews.title: ... know from experience that they will stretch and be great. Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: They feel just a tad bit small but I know from experience that they may stretch. I have ordered a size up which is coming this week and will decide between the two once they get here.
customer_reviews.author: 1970turtle

customer_reviews.title: Cute But Not To Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe for an awesome price. Not as comfy as most Bear traps shoes but they will do. Took away a star because of the comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: glovable

customer_reviews.title: Quality and confort
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these boots for the first time they are so comfortable Love the inside wedge makes more comfortable Love Bare Trap never dissapoints
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great to begin with....but is falling apart 🙁
customer_reviews.text: Great boots....great price. Revised: I am changing my original review. I have been so excited about these boots until....the soul started to come out and wrinkle under my foot. The side bucket has also started separating from the boot. Since I have worn these only a half dozen times...I am very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Saday

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love Bare traps shoes , they are true to size I wear a size 7.5 but I ordered 8 because I like to insert an insole for more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Chichi

customer_reviews.title: great boot but runs a bit larger
customer_reviews.text: Had to send them back. They run big. If you normally wear an 8, get a 7.
customer_reviews.author: sara browning

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and happy that they arrived so quickly. Good to travel in.
customer_reviews.author: Sukisan

customer_reviews.title: run small
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very nice but I had to send them back. They run small
customer_reviews.author: Kimmers88

customer_reviews.title: True to size, don’t order bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a half size up because boots with a wedge can be tricky. The boots are actually true to size and ordering them just a half bigger made them TOO big and too uncomfortable to keep. If I had ordered my real size they’d be perfect. Will be returning soon. Womp womp.
customer_reviews.author: Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new boots! They are much cuter than I expected, and super comfortable. Stylish, comfortable and excellent price, now that's a win! Very happy with my purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: RMBenz

product_meta.title: BareTraps Women's Bt Qui Ankle Bootie
product_meta.description: The baretraps qui features unique strap details that compliment this trendy boot, along with a discreet hidden heel for slight elevation. comfort details like a padded foam insole and easy-entry inner zipper make this boot enjoyable to wear all day long.
